svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Children in school: administrative data compared to household survey data,
Primary school-age children in school (%), based on household survey data
Primary school-age children in school (%), based on administrative data
Source: World Bank – WDI, World Bank
